title: Federal Government investigating lack of female Hollywood directors
text: Federal Government investigating lack of female Hollywood directors Thursday, 8 October 2015 (40 seconds ago) The Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is investigating why there are so few female directors in Hollywood The E.E.O.C. is finally starting to look into gender discrimination in Hollywood, starting with one of the hardest hit groups: female directors. Recent related news Watch VideoHollywood's fight for gender discrimination has been in the media just about as much as Taylor Swift's girl squad has — and the government is... Newsy 5 hours ago - World The federal Equal Employment Opportunity Commission will begin interviewing dozens of female directors next week in an effort to see what action, if any, it...
